Mee Pwar () is a Burmese film director who won the Myanmar Motion Picture Academy Awards for best director with the film Zaw Ka Ka Nay The (Dancing the Zawgyi Dance) in 2009.
Filmography
Film
* Yan Thu 2020
* Problem (Myanmar) 2019
* Kyar Tot The Lal Mg Sagar
* The Enemy (Myanmar)
* Angel of Eden (Burmese Movie)
* Sweet Vengeance for Love 2017
* POST MYANMORE AWARDS 2015 THANK YOU
* Into The Hills
* Zaw-Ka Ka Nay Thi (Dancing the Zawgyi Dance) 2009
* Colorsone Lesson
